articles.title: 'Sheryl': Why Sheryl Crow's new Showtime documentary was 'emotional and exhausting' - USA TODAY
articles.description: "Sheryl" debuted at Austin's South by Southwest (SXSW) festival and will air on Showtime in May. "I wanted it to be really honest," Crow said.
articles.content:
AUSTIN, Texas – Sheryl Crow needed to be sold on a documentary about her life. 
The pitch came from her longtime manager and close friend Scooter Weintraub. He'd gotten the idea after devouring nume… [+3350 chars]

articles.title: Mila Kunis Reveals Why She Used To Say She Was Russian - LADbible
articles.description: The actor born in Chernivtsi has cleared up why she would tell people she was Russian
articles.content:
Mila Kunis, who was born in Ukraine, has revealed why she used to tell people she was from Russia.
